summary: In New Mexico, a Confederate veteran returns home to find his fiancée married to a Union soldier, his Yankee neighbors rallied against him and his property sold by the local banker who then hires a gunman to kill him.
cast: Yul Brynner|Janice Rule|George Segal|Alfred Ryder|Clifford David|Mike Kellin|Brad Dexter|Pat Hingle|Bert Freed|John A. Alonzo|Curt Conway|Clarke Gordon|Gerald Hiken|Strother Martin|Clifton James|William Hickey|Gertrude Flynn|Olive Dunbar|Ray Beltram|Eumenio Blanco|John Bose|Woody Chambliss|Mimi Doyle|Joe Garcio|Mickey Golden|Herman Hack|Chuck Hamilton|Maria Haro|Michael Hinn|Dal Jenkins|Russell Johnson|Stan Jones|Kay Koury|Emma Palmese|Arthur Peterson|John Roy|George Russell|George Sowards|Ray Spiker|Charles Thompson|Tony Urchel|Max Wagner|Chalky Williams
title: Invitación a un pistolero
